elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Tough 1].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Permanent.
[][]I am [Tough 2].  When I leave the Expedition zone — If I have 1 or more boosts: Put the top card of your deck in your Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Tough 1].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Permanent.
[][]I am [Tough 2].  When I leave the Expedition zone — []You may discard target Permanent.
[][]I am [Tough 1].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Draw a card.
[][]I am [Tough 1].  When I leave the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: [Sabotage].
[][]I am [Tough 2].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may put me in my owner's Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Tough 1].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Draw a card.
[][]I am [Tough 2].  When I leave the Expedition zone — []You may put me in my owner's Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Tough 2].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may discard one of your Mana Orbs. If you do: [Sabotage].
[][]I am [Tough 1].  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Draw a card.
[][]I am [Tough 2].  {R} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Put the top two cards of your deck in your Mana zone (as exhausted Mana Orbs).
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 2 boosts.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Tough 1].  {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Put the top card of your deck in your Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Tough 2].  {H} You may discard one of your Mana Orbs. If you do: Target Character in your other Expedition (the one I'm not in) gains 2 boosts.
[][]I am [Tough 2].  {R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Put the top card of your deck in your Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Tough 2].  At Dusk — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Put the top card of your deck in your Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Tough 2].  {J} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Target Character in your other Expedition (the one I'm not in) gains 2 boosts.
